On Sep 16, 2009, at 6:06 PM, Eric J. Bowman wrote:

> There are no shortcuts to gaining the benefits of RESTful

+1

What the community would really benefit from would be efforts of  
(quasi-)standardizing media types and link relations that address 80%  
of the typical intra-enterprise use cases.
